common.bannerTitle: New Era of Fashion Online Shopping with Virtual Outfit Try-On
common.switchUserToTryOnDescription: If you select another person to Try-On, all your previous Try-On data will be deleted.
common.switchUserToTryOnWarning: Are you sure you want to continue?
common.productVariantsTitle: Customers often pair these. Choose to Try-On now.
common.doYouWantToUseThisPhoto: Do you want to use this photo?

detectCamera.title: Prepare your photo
detectCamera.instruction: Adjust the angle until the dot is centered and the circle changes color.

photoGuide.title: Prepare to take photo
photoGuide.instruction: Position your camera straight and at waist height. Carefully step back into the space behind you until you can see your entire body on the screen.

sideView.title: Scan side view
sideView.instruction: Rotate 90° and stand straight, matching the pose guide.

frontView.title: Front View
frontView.instruction: Stand upright, face the camera, and match the pose guide.

result.title: Result
result.instruction: Your photo has been processed successfully.
